known_issues: 'Mark completed' button is not showing in the admin dashboard within the respective worker's jobs

existing_features.title: Remove all statistic/summary boxes from the Worker Dashboard so the worker sees no job summary metrics (e.g., Total Jobs, Pending, Completed) and the page remains functional with the worker’s job list section intact.

In the Admin Dashboard’s worker management view, show each worker’s assigned jobs (inquiries) and render a visible 'Mark Completed' button on each individual job card for that worker when the job is not yet completed.

Wire the Admin 'Mark Completed' button to update the inquiry status to completed using existing admin-authorized backend calls, then refresh relevant admin and worker job data so the completed status appears immediately.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all statistic/summary boxes from the worker dashboard, leaving only the worker's job list
Fix admin dashboard so the 'mark completed' button appears on each individual job card inside each worker’s job list

projectName: Simplify worker dashboard and restore admin 'Mark Completed' per worker job cards
